medical_history.chief_complaint: Ulcerated rashes on the left ankle and both sides of the jaw.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with a two-year history of the mentioned rashes. The skin lesions were slightly itchy and sometimes painful. There was no history of skin trauma. She had previously received surgical treatment for a suspected cutaneous tumor, and after that, there had been no recurrence for three years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 diabetes diagnosed three years prior to presentation.
medical_history.social_history: The patient works at a construction site.
